bridge-type.label: Honeywell My Total Connect Comfort Web Site Bridge
bridge-type.description: This bridge manages the connection to the Honeywell My Total Connect Comfort web site to manage thermostat settings. After configuring your email and password in the bridge, it will auto discover all thermostats in your My Total Connect Comfort site
